description:
It's time to get into the mini swing of things with Crazy Mini Golf 2! Choose from 4 differently themed worlds and 18 fun and challenging holes in each world. 
With the ability to customize your golf avatar from your head to your shoes with thousands of possibilities, great multiplayer mode, this might possibly be the most fun you've ever had on a miniature golf course! 
The Kidz Sports crew is back in their craziest sports adventure yet. Crazy Golf features four complete courses, for a total of 72 holes of putt-putt fun. Choose from multiple game modes to play alone for with friends.
•	72 larger-than-life holes with bright colorful interactive levels 
•	Four exciting new courses including Waicoco Islands, Volcano Beach, Jungle Temple, Teekee Moon.
•	Engage in single player or multiplayer championships to see who is the ultimate crazy golf champion? 
•	Single-Player Championship Mode – Hone your skills in the single player challenge.
name: Crazy Mini Golf Arcade
